titleStmt.title: Two letters the one from a Dutchman to his correspondent in England, the other an answer from the said correspondent : in which most things of note (that relate to, or have been transacted in this in this hostility) are very fully handled : with the present condition of both countries.
titleStmt.author: F. C.
J. G.

notesStmt.note: First letter signed: F.C.; second letter signed: J.G.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
